com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Interface NonDeterministicPosTagger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PosTagger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardStatisticalPosTagger

    public interface NonDeterministicPosTagger
extends PosTagger
    A non-deterministic pos tagger, which analyses multiple tokenising possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple postagging possibilities.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagger

        LEMMA_ATTRIBUTE, LEMMA_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE, POS_TAG_ATTRIBUTE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBeamWidth()
      The maximum number of possible sequences returned by the pos-tagger.
      boolean isPropagateTokeniserBeam()
      Should the full tokeniser beam be propagated as input into the pos-tagger.
      java.util.List<PosTagSequence> tagSentence(java.util.List<TokenSequence> tokenSequences)
      Analyse a list of token sequences, each of which represents one possibility of tokenising a given sentence, and return the n most likely pos tag sequences for the sentence.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagger

        addObserver, clonePosTagger, getPosTaggerFeatures, getPosTaggerRules, setPosTaggerRules, tagSentence

    • Method Detail

      • tagSentence

        java.util.List<PosTagSequence> tagSentence(java.util.List<TokenSequence> tokenSequences)
                                    throws UnknownPosTagException,
                                           TalismaneException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Analyse a list of token sequences, each of which represents one possibility of tokenising a given sentence, and return the n most likely pos tag sequences for the sentence. The number of token sequences provided as input can be different from the number of pos-tagging possibilities returned as output.
        Parameters:
        tokenSequences - the n most likely token sequences for this sentence.
        Returns:
        the n most likely postag sequences for this sentence
        Throws:
        UnknownPosTagException - if an unknown pos-tag is guessed
        TalismaneException
        java.io.IOException

      • getBeamWidth

        int getBeamWidth()
        The maximum number of possible sequences returned by the pos-tagger.

      • isPropagateTokeniserBeam

        boolean isPropagateTokeniserBeam()
        Should the full tokeniser beam be propagated as input into the pos-tagger.
